news.content:
Hello there! This is Psychic Connections' newsfeed. You can keep up to date with the latest news here.

And for this first news, we'd like to announce that Psychic Connections is going NSFW on the next build! That means we'll have to flag it as such on itch.io, and it'll stop showing up on the search results there unless you're logged in with an account AND have "suggestive games" turned on in the settings. You can still access the game directly by the itch.io page without an account. We added a button that takes you to the itch.io page of the game on the main menu as well for your convenience. Alternatively, you can also bookmark the itch.io page, or even access it from Google by searching for "psychic connections vn". So with all that said, make sure you don't miss the next build!
